acquireTask

public java.lang.Object acquireTask(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> customTaskData)
This will block the process thread from starting the task, when it is unblocked it will return the data stored in the task node. This data can be used by the This call assumes that the tasks are already set up

指定者：
接口 TaskManager 中的 acquireTask
返回：
Object containing data related to the task
